tweets.text:
Never put wet wipes, cotton pads or kitchen roll down the toilet.

They don't break down in the same way as toilet paper - leading to blocked sewers. Only flush the 3 Ps - pee, poo and toilet paper.

Share the video to let others know¬†how to protect¬†their¬†pipes this #Unblocktober https://t.co/2fGsxkivfv

tweets.text: Essential to sort this out - Hampshire's chalk streams are some of the jewels in the crown of Britain's beleaguered wildlife. No place for neonics anywhere and especially in the River Itchen. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencySE @HantsIWWildlife https://t.co/tHma7uM4UK

New Forest local partnerships are exploring a sustainable future for the challenges facing the coastal frontage between Hurst Spit and Lymington.  Read on: https://t.co/ByROLNnscl
@EnvAgencySE https://t.co/GtVCfTbJWP

@GarethTrewick @EnvAgencyYNE @CoalAuthority Hi Gareth. The main reason is their robustness. This site is highly active and the river has a lot of energy at this point, so the logs should be able to withstand that better. Our hope is that we will get vegetation established at this site in the long run.

[1/2] Good to see local councils attempt to stop @ThamesWater discharging raw sewage into public rivers.

As councillor Linda Smith points out, @UKGov has encouraged deregulation & tacitly permitted pollution by slashing funding for @EnvAgency.

Read: https://t.co/e7MzGDifrP https://t.co/liA0XlHLZT

No. 8 of 10 spoil heaps we're tackling this year. Toxic chemicals from this mound wash into the river nr #Nenthead and are carried all the way downstream and out to sea at #Tynemouth. We're using natural materials to stabilise it #reducingpollution @EnvAgencyYNE @CoalAuthority https://t.co/yGW6IbjV5X

Here's our Fisheries Enforcement Officers showing Police Forces in the #NorthWest the various illegal instruments used by poachers for the illegal taking of salmonids and coarse fish.

This partnership work is carried out twice a year with various Police Forces.

tweets.text: @EnvAgency @AnglianWater 5 P's - pee, poo, puke, pus & paper.  :D

Officers have been to Canvey Island to carry out routine checks at the pumping stations.

The pictures show debris being removed from the pumping station grills.  Make sure you report flooding or blockages to 0800 807060üìû #Essex https://t.co/ZvKa3wukGt

Another picture from the #Worcester Southern Link Road dualling project - this is Powick viaduct, not easily seen from Temeside Way, which allows water to flow underneath the A4440 at times of flood https://t.co/3fbAlcwEWT

We're fighting to put a stop to waste crime and won‚Äôt hesitate to take action against those responsible. Joint investigations will continue. Those convicted face extensive fines and even prison sentences. Report waste crime on 0800 807060 or to CrimeStoppers on 0800 555 111 https://t.co/0xcQdfI4GA

Happy Friday to our wonderful @WCCPnews volunteers. Thanks @Morrisons for your great leader too. We are hoping to get rid of as much litter before trout spawning season. The good news - much less of it today.@DoverTC @DoverDC @EnvAgencySE https://t.co/2FxR1mSWwI
